adDetails: Unforgettable Blue is a California wide, Wedding and Event Videography Company. We have been in Business for over 4 years, and have filmed a wedding in nearly every city from Sacramento to LA. We know how important it is to be ready to capture the moment at a seconds notice. We are always early, and always professional. If you're interested in having your wedding filmed, please contact Kevin at Unforgettable Blue, and we'd be glad to go over any details. Here's my website, where you an see my pricing and work: www.unforgettableblue.com Thank You!
